text:
Hey!
For @_buildspace @_nightsweekends  I'm building a free website to make recruitment easy for startups, entrepreneurs, and SMEs who are struggling to recruit interns, staff, or even partners.
This idea came from my struggle to find people I needed for tech roles in my team. https://t.co/UbZYILWh4N
